text:
The purpose of this 
Article III is to describe the affordable housing and home ownership bond program ("program") pursuant to which the City and County of San Francisco ("City") may loan or grant general obligation bond proceeds for the development of affordable housing for low-income households and for down payment assistance to low and moderate income first-time home buyers, each as further described in this 
Article III. 
(Added by Ord. 12-00, File No. 992117, App. 2/11/2000)
